text: I bought a new computer a few months ago, and with it I was able to emulate and beat Paper Mario: The Thousand Year Door, Super Paper Mario, Partners in Time and Bowser's Inside Story. author: main_gi

text:
IMO Partners in Time was the best, Saga's Bowletta battle stance was creepy as hell, and Bowser's Inside Story was just too forgettable. Here's what I remember (spoilers):
- Bowser eats a Lucky Shroom from (f)Awful the Merchant
- Bowser sucks up everything, literally
- Mario and Luigi explore the hell out of Bowser's insides.
- Bowser goes in a mine and [FORGET]
- Bowser somehow lands in a safe due to betrayal
- Mario and Luigi, out of Bowser's body, attack him (HOW)
- Kill the Dark Star!
author: main_gi
